experience.title: Business Mentor-Strategic Advisor to CEO
experience.description: Spaceonova is the leading space education & research startup in India."If God made you capable of helping someone, it's your duty to do so"My Mom taught me this at an early age. Then, at 18, when I was trying to get into Startups, I met the most accepting mentors. Everyone in ecosystem was very kind to me.As a beginner, I used to think that I need mentors from the specific domain I‚Äôm working in. Or to be experts in skills I‚Äôm seeking to learn. Well, not absolutely correct. So far, I‚Äôve had mentors from different sectors. Academia, Banking, financial services, Chemical Technology and processing.I‚Äôve learnt a lot from them. I look up to them whenever I‚Äôm stuck somewhere. Irrespective of the size or type of challenge. I personally feel that working closely with mentors catalysed my growth as an entrepreneur and a person as well.Now, I see, life coming full circle. Maybe, too early but that‚Äôs how my career had been so far, haha.I‚Äôm super excited to work with @shivam & team to brainstorm & solve business challenges for Spacenova. It‚Äôs always a pleasure to be working with him. I get to learn so much from him about Space Tech & entrepreneurship in general.Let‚Äôs create a Space Ecosystem where limit tends to infinity!
experience.description_html: Spaceonova is the leading space education & research startup in India."If God made you capable of helping someone, it's your duty to do so"My Mom taught me this at an early age. Everyone in ecosystem was very kind to me.As a beginner, I used to think that I need mentors from the specific domain I‚Äôm working in. Or to be experts in skills I‚Äôm seeking to learn. Well, not absolutely correct. So far, I‚Äôve had mentors from different sectors. Academia, Banking, financial services, Chemical Technology and processing.I‚Äôve learnt a lot from them. I look up to them whenever I‚Äôm stuck somewhere. Irrespective of the size or type of challenge. Maybe, too early but that‚Äôs how my career had been so far, haha.I‚Äôm super excited to work with @shivam & team to brainstorm & solve business challenges for Spacenova. It‚Äôs always a pleasure to be working with him. I get to learn so much from him about Space Tech & entrepreneurship in general.Let‚Äôs create a Space Ecosystem where limit tends to infinity!

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneur's Network
positions.description: I'm achieving a reach of 2.5k per post organically on average. This is fairly high as we have around 280 followers only. As compared to Facebook Ads, Facebook Ads on our page have a reach of just around few hundreds for $30. I'm proud to claim a 15 times more reach with our highest  reach which had a reach of 4.6k.I am a part of this Wonderful community Venture since very beginning as a freelancer. I am gaining a fair experience for establishing similar ventures.Working closely with David over community Marketing, I am currently working on the Facebook project. My responsibilities included establishing a Facebook page and manage it. I sincerely thank David to allow me Independence and authority to manage it on my own.

I'm being promoted to 'Product Manager- Community' at Entrepreneur's Network. However, I will continue my work in Social Media Marketing.
My Roles and Responsibilities include:
1) organize the Webinars for the community

2) Communication with speakers, participants, and clients about upcoming programs for the community.
 
3) Program managing will also include adding relevant content on our website about the community events.

experience.title: Community & Marketing Lead
experience.description: I initiated a new concept called SIPWay School a community lead learning platform where we taught people personal finance. In just 1 month, we grew to 5 batches teaching 500+ students with Zero budget.Our Assets under management grew 2X to 2 Crores in just 3 months. I looked after day-to-day operations including but not limited to1. Building community of personal finance enthusiasts2. Rebranded SIPWay as a friendly, innovative & trustworthy company3. Recruited 5 interns from India's leading Institutes like IIT B, JMI Delhi, ICT Mumbai, etc.4. Curated Content for SIPWay School community5. Co-designed curriculum6. Grew the SIPWay School community through various channels in zero to negligible budget.5. Co-designing videos & other visuals for Ads & curriculum6. Partnered up with various other Startups & organisations to further accelerate the community growth & engagement

recommendations: ‚ÄúI've known Saad for little over 2.5 years. He began as every other young chap with abundant energy and enthusiasm but a lot of chinks in the fundamental thought process but what set him apart was his willingness to understand his bottlenecks and possess the drive to work on them dedicatedly and persevere till he got results I closely mentored him for over a year on multiple aspects like team management, technology, sales, people management, work structuring etc. It's great to see his progress over these years as an entrepreneur wearing multiple hats. He has developed good fundamental understanding of the different aspects of running a tech startup. His resilience, passion & focus as an entrepreneur is commendable. I've seen & advised him during some of the toughest phases. I'm proud to see the way he tackled these situations with calm & rational mind and came out stronger. It's heartwarming to see Saad & Serri reaching new milestones. I wish Saad all the best for his future endeavours! He earns highest recommendation as an entrepreneur & young leader.‚Äù Show less

           got to witness #Canada at its best- a multi-cultural exchange of ideas with the brightest Master's students at University of New BrunswickIt was a honour sharing about our work and vision at Serri to the amazing class of Prof Dominic. I genuinely felt like studying there!We shared a intensely technical & broad problem statement with the students.felt very humbled evaluating and judging their presentations with possible solutions. Especially, given that they had just got 48 hours to evaluate, research and present their solutions. To prove their mettle. And, they did!Leaving with you with the lesson that- sometimes it's not time but lack of it that pushes you to succeed.

volunteer_experience.info:
Imagine, Ashneer Grover  or Ankur Warikoo convincing their parents to startup.Internet is full of advices, knowledge & wisdom by legendary entrepreneurs. However, what worked for them, may not work for you. I doubt, if Kunal Shah had to manage his end sem exams alongwith fundraising for CRED.We, Student Entrepreneurs have to. So, here it is:enSeed 's eXposure fellowship üéâIndia's first Startup Cohort for student entrepreneurs, by student‚Ä¶
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          Imagine, Ashneer Grover  or Ankur Warikoo convincing their parents to startup.Internet is full of advices, knowledge & wisdom by legendary entrepreneurs. However, what worked for them, may not work for you. I doubt, if Kunal Shah had to manage his end sem exams alongwith fundraising for CRED.We, Student Entrepreneurs have to. So, here it is:enSeed 's eXposure fellowship üéâIndia's first Startup Cohort for student entrepreneurs, by student entrepreneurs.Some of India's coolest student founders are coming together to expose you to the startup world. Taking some time off their own hustles and ventures.The program curriculum is designed especially for college students (open to all) with live sessions, hands-on assignments & resources to help you in your startup journey. Within 16 weekends :)Entrepreneurship isn't a joke. You probably won't even get close to that even after the fellowship. But, if you've what it takes, it'd be the best beginning you can possibly ask for.Idea is to bring together the brightest, bravest & kindest together & mentor them thoroughly. To get them started with their own or join India's youngest startups.Your college years are probably the best time to explore, experiment & get ahead.DM me or Shubham Raj for collabs :)
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: enSeed
volunteer_experience.title: Founder & Community Catalyst

volunteer_experience.info: Selected as one of the 100 delegates across the Nation to attend the Leadership Bootcamp organized by Youth Parliament Program. Leadership2. Policy Making 3. Role of Governments 4. Taxation5. Education SectorI've voice notes if you need them. Just ping me.

volunteer_experience.info: It was a wonderful Journey from team building to unforgettable moments, we cherished together. I had a sour throat but a great time leading the young & enthusiastic team of E-cell ICT. We made it to the top 10 in most of the Competitions out of 50-200 teams.

volunteer_experience.title: Director of International Services

volunteer_experience.info: SuperTeacher Eduforms conducts coding workshops for school students. Being an early-stage entrepreneur myself, I was invited to share my learnings with students & aspiring entrepreneurs. I was told that the audience would have students from Class 3 onwards from India & overseas. I was both excited & nervous. For a better understanding of students, I had to tone down every word. Absolutely jargon-free. In the end, it was a great interactive session. We enjoyed it thoroughly:)
volunteer_experience.subtitle: SuperTeacher Eduform
volunteer_experience.title: Student Entrepreneurship Workshop

          VORTEX is not only India‚Äôs but Asia's largest ChemFest combining a wide array of fields such as Chemical Engineering, Polymers and Coatings, Dyes, Oils, Foods, Pharmacy, and PharmaTechnology, Biotechnology and Biological Sciences, Business, Entrepreneurship and what not!Here, I was responsible for calling and convincing Industrialists to sponsor Vortex and also ensure that we are providing them value for their money. I'm glad that I could contribute significantly to the Succes of Event. The sales, negotiations and other Skills I learnt would be helpful to me for life. I'm proud to be one of the 5 'Dedicated Coords' out of 21.

I'm glad to get featured alongside notable Entrepreneurs like Mrs. Ohol Ahilya, CEO of Shatashree- a Herbal Concept, Mr. Abhijit K. Bhand, CEO @ KanadLabs, Mr. Saurabh Varpe & Sandesh Deokar, CEO at Snap Eng."}]

organizations.title: Rotaract Club of Kings Circle Matunga
organizations.description: Honoured to be part of Board of Directors for Rotaract Club.I'll be responsible for:1.) Representing Rotaract Club of King's Circle Internationally2.) Maintaining relationships with other Organizations glocally.3.) Coordinating with other Rotaract Clubs globally.All the aforementioned responsibilities are meant to serve society for greater collective good for all of us, especially the underprivileged.

honors_and_awards.title: Eureka Winner- Asia's Biggest Startup Competition
honors_and_awards.description: We won EUREKA! Asia's largest business model competition organised by IIT Bombay. More than 15,000 startups competed for this 25th edition of Eureka, the flagship event of E-summit, by IIT B. Thanks to efforts by incredibly driven team Serri, our mentors' support & all of your best wishes- Serri is the Eureka winner! Coming from Haldwani, winning Asia's largest business model competition feels surreal. Trying to believe it has happened as I type. Thanks everyone for‚Ä¶ Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Top 20 Global Tech Competition
honors_and_awards.description: Headed by Steve Wozniak, Apple Co-founder, Future labs organised a Global Tech Competition for battling COVID-19 challenges. I lead our team to top 20 among 300 entries globally from MIT, Harvard, Michigan, Oxford, Cambridge, etc. Every year Prospect 100 publishes a list of the 100 best youth talents Aged 21 & Under in the World for Tech, Engineering & Design. Proudly, I'm one of those this year for Serri Tech Solutions.

honors_and_awards.title: Jr. IDP Winner
honors_and_awards.description: Our team won Jr. IDP, one of the flagship Events of VORTEX-7.O, Asia's Largest Chemfest. The event was about Case Studies regarding Challenges faced by Industries We won the 1st Prize, presented publicly by Mr. D.J. Sanghvi, Managing Director, Aarvi Encon Industries pvt ltd.

honors_and_awards.title: Rising Talent by UpWork
honors_and_awards.description: I have been honoured as Rising Talent by Upwork Inc. I'm most probably the youngest one to achieve this. This badge signifies that I, as a freelancer has already demonstrated strong performance in a shorter duration of time.

honors_and_awards.title: LIC-Student of the Year
honors_and_awards.description: I was awarded with the ' LIC-Student of the Year' award for my all-round excellent performance in the year 2015-16. I've been receiving similar intra school awards since 5th Std. In a row. Without a miss.
